about_the_game:
In the thick of a man-made dustbowl—where the poor beg for scraps from the rich—you play as a driver trying to survive the wastelands taking any job he can to get by. Caught between a hail of bullets and a colorful cast of characters, the fate of the community rests on your decisions. Drive fast, choose wisely.

Features:

  • Explore An Unique World!
    Make your own choices in a large detailed open world, discover factions fighting to control the wasteland and the small number of supplies left.

  • Be Who You Wanna Be!
    Build your character as you like with attributes and skills, collect boy scout badges to grant special perks, and build the best you.

  • Enjoy The Beauty!
    Next-generation graphics bring this world to life and allow for a hyper-detailed and realistic environment. Dynamic day and night systems affect lighting in the world in real-time!

  • Guns, Guns, and More Guns
    Get armed to the teeth with unique weapons and items to approach any situation how you decide, run in guns blazing or take a stealthy approach the choice is yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Six Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
